week_overview: This base phase week focuses on building your aerobic foundation with three easy-paced runs, including a solid long run. A single bodyweight strength session will support overall strength and injury prevention.

running_sessions.workout_description: Start your week with a comfortable easy run to build your aerobic base. Focus on maintaining a conversational pace.
Another easy run to continue building endurance. Keep the effort level low and enjoy the movement.
Your weekly long run! This is crucial for building endurance and mental toughness. Maintain a steady, comfortable pace throughout.

exercises.name: Squats
exercises.form_cues: Focus on depth, keeping your chest up and knees tracking over your toes.

exercises.name: Lunges
exercises.form_cues: Maintain balance, ensure front knee doesn't go past toes, and back knee hovers above the ground.

exercises.name: Push-ups
exercises.form_cues: Keep your body in a straight line from head to heels. Modify on knees if needed.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.form_cues: Engage your core, keep your back flat, and avoid sagging hips.

exercises.name: Glute Bridges
exercises.form_cues: Squeeze your glutes at the top, lifting your hips until your body forms a straight line from shoulders to knees.
